snippet: Shares of Avon rose after the company agreed to sell its North American business to Cerberus Capital Management.
abstract: Stocks fall late in trading to end weak day.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Avon rose after the company agreed to sell its North American business to Cerberus Capital Management.

headline.main: Market Slumps as Energy and Commodity Prices Drop
headline.print_headline: A Sharp Drop in the Final Minutes Caps a Weak Day on Wall Street
